ezxpns.data.records
Class RecordManager<T extends Record>

java.lang.Object
  ezxpns.data.Storable
      ezxpns.data.records.RecordManager<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of records (expense/income) to manage
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecordQueryHandler<T>, CategoryHandlerInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpenseRecordManager
public class RecordManager<T extends Record>
extends Storable
implements RecordQueryHandler<T>, CategoryHandlerInterface

A java Generic to manage records

Author:
yyjhao
